content:
Quinn returned home one summer's day to find it sweat-inducingly hot! He turned the air conditioner on and fell asleep. The room's temperature decreased by $0.5^\circ$ Celsius each minute, and Quinn woke up $60$ minutes later when it was  $10^\circ$ Celsius.

**Graph the relationship between the room's temperature (in degrees Celsius) and time (in minutes).**  

[[â˜ƒ grapher 1]]
